name: Circus Charlie
description:
The Greatest show on disk!

Always wanted to join the circus? Here i your big chance, Charlie. Under this Big Top, you're a regular one man show. ump your pony through hoops. Walk the tightrope. Hit the trampoline. And don't forget the Flying Trapeze 

And you're not just clowning around. There is big money on each stunt. Bonus bucks, too. P. T. Barnum sure never paid like this. Of course, Tom Thumb never had to work like this, either.

Keep at it long enough , and maybe some day you can buy this circus. In the meantime, remember:
The Show must go on!
